enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
sentences: Bernard Mazijn (Belgium), Chair of the Expert Group on Technology Transfer (EGTT), reported on EGTT activities (FCCC/SBSTA/2006/INF.4).
Many welcomed the five-theme structure of EGTT work.
The US, EU, and others stressed the private sector role and CHINA underscored the public sector.
AUSTRALIA, JAPAN and others highlighted the G8 and Asia-Pacific partnerships.
The G-77/CHINA underscored adaptation technologies and South-South cooperation.
Carlos Fuller (Belize) and Kunihiko Shimada (Japan) will co-chair a contact group.
